net.objectzoo.delegates.adapters

Class Action0ToAction0Async

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.objectzoo.delegates.adapters.Action0ToAction0Async
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Action0Async

    public class Action0ToAction0Async
extends Object
implements Action0Async
    An adapter that converts a conventional Action0 to an Action0Async.

    All asynchronous calls are executed in another thread and forwarded to the Action0.start() method.

    The Executor to use for the asynchronous invocations can be chosen during creation of this adapter. If no explicit executor is given the a default executor is used. The default executor can be set using the AsyncExecutor.setDefaultExecutor(Executor) property or is created automatically by the AsyncExecutor.

    Author:
    tilmann

    • Method Detail

      • beginStart

        public ActionAsyncResult beginStart(Consumer<ActionAsyncResult> callback,
                                    Object asyncState)
        Asynchronously invoke this Action0Async with the given parameter value, callback and asyncState.

        Associated with each call to beginInvoke is an ActionAsyncResult instance returned by the call and given to the callback that can be used to track the status and outcome of the invocation.

        Specified by:
        beginStart in interface Action0Async
        Parameters:
        callback - the Consumer, if given to beginInvoke, is invoked upon completion of the Action0Async's invocation and receives the same ActionAsyncResult that is returned by the call to beginInvoke.
        asyncState - the asyncState is an arbitrary reference that, if given to beginInvoke, can be retrieved from this invocations ActionAsyncResult.getAsyncState()
        Returns:
        the ActionAsyncResult associated with this asynchronous invocation
